info: Rating, 5 stars,  · 4 days ago,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: It was a pleasure to stay at Robin’s place. They are very responsible, friendly and excellent hosts. The location is great and the apartment offers plenty of space with a huge kitchen for cooking. In short… from my three stays in their apartment, I can say it’s one of the best places to live in Gulshan for those who coming from abroad
